title: Ryze's skills change extremely lame
body: why have the changed the skills on ryze i havnt used ryze in a wile and i just had a match with him and WOW like there was nothing wrong with hes old skill set specially he's E like wtf haha such a let down guys. like to be honest the new ones are not bad but god dam they suck compered to the old ones especially skill E bounce circle sucks and so small i used to do heaps of team dmg with my ult and E well now it basically hits only the 1 champ unless they are side by side witch there ant many chances of that happening. and clearing minion waves was fun with ult and E well haha doesn't any more

replies.body: Ryzes old skill set was too hard to balance properly. He was either OP or completely terrible depending on how the numbers were tweaked

his new E is op wtf? especially against melees thinking they can block your q by standing inside a minion wave, and also it can give potentially 36% magic shred, and you can still clear waves just as well if not better with R-E.
His e is horrid now but his w is super op.
